title: Ticket #5458: HTCondor View: support JSONP for .oldest. file
description: The .oldest. files (ex. submitter.oldest.json) cannot be loaded as JSONP as the code in question managing the load is using jQuery.ajax and not specifying dataType:'jsonp'. Ideally we'd use the same logic as Afterquery: If XHR fails, try JSONP. If XHR succeeds, strip out the JSONP wrapper so we can parse it correctly.
creator: adesmet
